text: ninnal addehatte sahayikkunnillenkil tirccuyayum allahu ‎addehatte sahayiccittunt. satyanisedhikal addehatte ‎purattakkiya sandarbhatattilanat. addeham rantalukalil ‎oruvanavukayum iruvarum guhayilayirikkukayum ceytappeal. ‎addeham tanre kuttukaraneat parannu: "duhkhikkatirikkuka; allahu ‎nam'meateappamunt.” anneram allahu tannil ninnulla samadhanam ‎addehattin sam'maniccu. ninnalkku kananavatta pearalikalal ‎addehattin karuttekukayum ceytu. oppam satyanisedhikalute ‎vacanatte avan parre patitamakki. allahuvinre vacanam tanneyan ‎atyunnatam. allahu pratapiyum yuktimanum tanne. ‎
